name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen submitted a post saying that he had asked relevant personnel and learned that NetEase News did not have the position of editor-in-chief, so the news might not be true.

Netizen contribution
A nucleic acid test certificate is required to enter the UK from mainland China

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, "fireworks heroes" have appeared all over the country on short video websites in China.
It is suspected that they are resisting the current regulations prohibiting the setting off of fireworks in various places.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Verifying the information of arrested protesters is very tedious, difficult and necessary. Therefore, I cannot publish any content containing personal information without absolutely accurate information and confirmation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In addition, regarding the information about the Fudan girl today, the person seeking help used a link of my tweet when sending it to other Twitter users, but he himself did not contact me directly.
I have conveyed my inquiry about the incident through other netizens, and I will notify you if there is any new progress later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @KhanBerke2 There are indeed people who are posting articles everywhere, and it is not made up by other Twitter users.

content:
Netizen contribution
An academician said that if the world does not share vaccines, the virus will be shared by the world
This has triggered a discussion among netizens about vaccines

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens ask for help
My elder bought a disinfectant powder that claims to kill 99.9% of coronaviruses. I hope to ask everyone to verify whether this thing is credible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution Tonight, Xuchang, Henan
Some citizens set off fireworks on the street and were stopped by the police. However, soon, someone else set off fireworks not far away, which attracted cheers from the crowd.
According to the "Notice on the Prohibition of Setting Off Fireworks and Firecrackers in the Whole Area" of Xuchang City, starting from February 7, 2020, setting off fireworks and firecrackers in the whole area will be prohibited. Violators may be fined 100-500 yuan and administratively detained for up to 15 days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: An ICU doctor shares his experience in treating COVID-19

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xi Jinping delivered a New Year's message for 2023
"China is so big that different people will have different demands and different views on the same thing. This is normal."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Afterwards, people continued to set off fireworks, and in the video, we can see that there were many police cars at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The police wanted to take away the young people who were setting off fireworks, but were stopped by the public, who said: Why should I follow you?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People surrounded the police to prevent the young man from being taken away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
An article titled "Friends Circles Dead in 2022" was circulated in WeChat Moments. When you click on it, you will see screenshots of the date of each day with "Content cannot be viewed", which can be called performance art.
In the end, this article was blocked.

content: In Taikang County, Zhoukou, Henan, many police officers came to set off fireworks. Some people were arrested and the masses demanded their release.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Zhengzhou, Henan: People celebrate New Year's Eve on the streets
This is a finale for a city where so much has happened in 2022.
